title: InitializeCommunicationFBConnections (Method)
text:
METHOD InitializeCommunicationFBConnections : BOOL
This method is called before the Cyclic-RMP-Communication AND provides you with
a complete List of all locally (on one application) generated
communication FBs (including the this instance).

rows.Name: pComFBs
rows.Comment: The list of locally generated communication FBs

rows: This is the number of locally generated communication FBspComFBs
